text: Finished chairing a mortgage lenders roundtable with @AskNationwide @santanderuk @HSBC_UK @BarclaysUK @LloydsBank @HalifaxBank @NatWest_Help to understand their approaches to risk for high rises with cladding. Most are revising guidance to valuers to reduce need for EWS1 surveys.
